hero.title: Christian Festa
hero.subTitle: Welcome to my portfolio website! I'm Christian Festa, a seasoned system integrator specializing in UI/UX design, front-end development, and product management. My site showcases my professional journey, technical skills, and a variety of projects that highlight my expertise in design and the delivery of responsive high-quality web applications. Explore my work to see how I integrate these roles to deliver innovative and successful digital solutions.

heroCard.title: Designer
heroCard.subTitle: I excel in leading cross-functional teams, mentoring designers, and aligning design strategies with business goals. I championed the creation and maintenance of comprehensive design standards and custom design systems within Figma.

heroCard.title: Developer
heroCard.subTitle: I built this app using React with TypeScript for a seamless interface, Vite for optimized performance, JSON for content separation, and a blend of Bootstrap and custom CSS for a unique, responsive design. This approach enabled me to create a design that go beyond traditional resumes.

heroCard.title: Product Manager
heroCard.subTitle: Proven leader with clear communication and a track record of successfully and concurrently managing complex Design, Develop, and Integrate (DDI) projects, Maintenance & Operations (M&O) projects, and Commercial Off-the-Shelf (COTS) implementations.

experience.title: Technical Delivery Lead & Principal Designer
experience.description:
Led the design, development, and integration (DDI) of a public and an admin portal on Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud serving as both Principal Designer and Delivery Lead.
Installed and configured project wide application and established project wide best practices and processes.
Guiding cross-functional teams to ensure a seamless user experience across both portals.
Establishing a comprehensive Figma design system for WCAG compliance and responsive design across devices.
Led the design direction for user flows and UX.

experience.title: Technical Product and Design Manager
experience.description:
Spearheaded the design, development, and integration (DDI) of a user portal on Google Cloud Platform, wearing the combined hat of Technical Product Manager and Design Manager.
Managed multiple projects concurrently, setting clear direction and priorities to ensure successful and on-time delivery.
Oversaw the completion of payment milestones and tracked progress, providing stakeholders with transparent status reports.
Established clear UI/UX standards and led the creation of a comprehensive Figma design system for WCAG compliance and responsive design across devices. This system streamlined development and ensured design consistency throughout the project.
Led the design direction for user flows and UX, oversaw the facilitation of rapid application development (RAD) sessions with the client to guarantee user needs were met.

experience.title: Technical Consultant
experience.organization: County Welfare Directors Association of California
experience.description: As a Technical Consultant, I played a vital role on the Independent Verification and Validation (IV&V) team. Leveraging my design expertise, I actively identified and analyzed potential integration issues within the multi-system environment to ensure seamless system interaction and overall project success.  Additionally, I collaborated with the project team to identify areas for process improvement, contributing recommendations that enhanced efficiency and reduced potential risks.

experience.title: System Integrator
experience.description: Extensive experience in System Integration Consulting, with a strong background in both sales and project execution. Skilled in managing Design, Develop, and Integrate (DDI) projects, Maintenance & Operations (M&O) projects, and COTS (Commercial Off-the-Shelf) implementations. Successfully co-authored winning proposals exceeding 1,000 pages. Adept at project management, effectively communicating progress through clear and concise weekly reports, and fostering strong relationships with key stakeholders.
